subtitle: A one-dish supper using Sausages, Tomatoes and cream, with a cheesy potato topping.

method.text: Slice the potatoes thinly, and then parboil for 6-10 minutes until they are tender. When cooked, drain, and rinse with cold water until they are cool enough to handled.
Place half of the onion at the bottom of an ovenproof dish.
Cover with the sausages, and then sprinkle over the herbs and remaining onions.
Slice the tinned tomatoes, retaining the juice, and then pour both over the sausage and onion mixture.
Layer the potatoes on top of the dish, and sprinkle the cheese over top.
Finally, pour the cream over the entire length of dish until it has soaked through the rest of the ingredients.
Place on a baking tray, and then bake in an oven at 180°C for 1 hour.

title: Sausage and tomato bake
